title: SET_WARNING_MESSAGE_WITH_HEADER
content:
0xDC38CC1E35B6A5D70x2DB9EAB5// SetWarningMessageWithHeader
void SET_WARNING_MESSAGE_WITH_HEADER(char* titleMsg, char* entryLine1, int flags, char* promptMsg, BOOL p4, Any p5, BOOL background, Any* p7, BOOL showBg);You can only use text entries. No custom text.  
C# Example :  
Function.Call(Hash._SET_WARNING_MESSAGE_2, "HUD_QUIT", "HUD_CGIGNORE", 2, "HUD_CGINVITE", 0, -1, 0, 0, 1);  
you can recreate this easily with scaleforms  
---------------  
Fixed native name, from before nativedb restoration.  
NativeDB Added Parameter 10: Any p9Old name:  _SET_WARNING_MESSAGE_2
codeBlocks:
// SetWarningMessageWithHeader
void SET_WARNING_MESSAGE_WITH_HEADER(char* titleMsg, char* entryLine1, int flags, char* promptMsg, BOOL p4, Any p5, BOOL background, Any* p7, BOOL showBg);

You can only use text entries. No custom text.  
C# Example :  
Function.Call(Hash._SET_WARNING_MESSAGE_2, "HUD_QUIT", "HUD_CGIGNORE", 2, "HUD_CGINVITE", 0, -1, 0, 0, 1);  
you can recreate this easily with scaleforms  
---------------  
Fixed native name, from before nativedb restoration.

-- Example usage for SET_WARNING_MESSAGE_WITH_HEADER
SetWarningMessageWithHeader('', '', 0, '', false, 0, false, 0, false)
